projects.title: The Telemedicine App
projects.bodyText:
- AI medical app made in with **Next.js**, **Firebase**, and the **OpenAI API**.
 -  User authentication and role-based access control with **Firebase Authentication.**
 - **Real-time chat functionality** for users using Firestore listeners, and chat management system for up to 100 past chats.

projects.title: Personal Trainer AI Chatbot
projects.bodyText:
- A Personal Trainer AI Chatbot using **Next.js, React, and Google Gemini**, enhancing user experience with personalized fitness advice.
- Fine-tuned GeminiAI through **prompt engineering** to gather information from the user, resulting in a **15% improvement** in response accuracy and user engagement.

projects.title: Internship Finder
projects.bodyText:
- Dynamic platform to assist students in finding relevant internships, resulting in **100 successful applications in the first month.**
- Populated database with internship postings **web-scraped using Cheerio**.
- **Successfully migrated 100% of user data to Firebase**, enhancing data reliability.
